/* grd.site_cd, */ '1' type_cd, grd.org_cd , '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' from OP.t_ct_error_mng mng, OP.t_ct_error_mng_guard grd, OP.t_ct_error err, OP.t_cm_common co1 where grd.guard_send_yn = 'C' and grd.create_date > TO_NUMBER(to_char( sysdate - 3, 'yyyymmdd' )) and grd.org_cd = err.org_cd(+) and grd.error_cd = err.error_cd(+) and grd.create_date = mng.create_date and grd.error_no = mng.error_no and co1.large_cd = '2301' and co1.small_cd = grd.recv_place
and co1.cd_nm2 = '6000' /*조은-6000*/
and co1.cd_nm2 = '7000' /*KT-7000*/
